title: Addressbook from Windows Thunderbird
creator: kanas
content: I have been unable to determine how I can import or otherwise use my Thunderbird Addressbook from my Windows laptop on my Android instance of Thunderbird.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/133.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36

title: Thunderbird for Android leaves no margin on the left when composing/sending email
creator: totaltampa
content: When I send an email in Thunderbird for Android using a Gmail account, Thunderbird leaves no margin on the left. Is this a bug, or how can I change this setting? (I've included a screenshot which is not from Thunderbird but still shows how my sent message appears.)
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:136.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/136.0

title: Notification on Pixel 8 pro
creator: pmko76
content: I don't get notification on my mobile phone when i get an email. Notification is enabled on my phone(notification settings) and in Thunderbird' app......?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/133.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android 15

title: Shared Microsoft mailbox
creator: reschaworth
content: Good evening I have been trying to add a shared Microsoft mailbox to Thunderbird for Android with partial success. I have managed to achieve it on a tablet but fail on a mobile. I attach a screenshot of the error message I get on the mobile (Please ignore the 2nd image as I cannot delete it). Both devices have the same 8.2 version. My mobile is a Pixel 6a and have Android 15 installed. Can you please help to solve the problem? Regards Russ Stephens
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/133.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:Android
